top_stories.title: Connecting the Dots for Better Movie Recommendations
top_stories.description:
Connecting the Dots for Better Movie Recommendations: Lightweight graph RAG on Rotten Tomatoes movie reviews
The post Connecting the Dots for Better Movie Recommendations appeared first on Towards Data Science.
top_stories.author: Brian Godsey

top_stories.title: The Meta AI app is a privacy disaster
top_stories.description: Meta does not indicate to users what their privacy settings are as they post, or where they are even posting to. So, if you log into Meta AI with Instagram, and your Instagram account is public, then so too are your searches.
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling

top_stories.title: Tesla sues former Optimus engineer over alleged trade secret theft
top_stories.description: Tesla alleges that Zhongjie Li stole confidential trade secrets and used them to launch a robotics startup a week after he left Tesla.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Szkutak
